entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 12:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning near noon then changing to rain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain and ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
